projectsList.title: LLM Vocabulary Difficulty Estimation System
projectsList.description: Development of a system that predicts vocabulary difficulty by training large language models with known difficulty data. Joint research project with National Institute for Japanese Language and Linguistics.
features: Automatic vocabulary difficulty prediction using BERT-based models
Machine learning models utilizing diverse linguistic features
Industry-academia collaboration with National Institute for Japanese Language and Linguistics
Evaluation using Japanese learner corpus data

projectsList.title: Education-Specialized LLM Development Project
projectsList.description: Research on developing education-specific large language models with novel architectures that overcome constraints of existing LLMs for foreign language education.
features: Custom model architecture design for educational domains
Novel evaluation metrics development and validation

projectsList.title: Automatic Vocabulary Question Generation System
projectsList.description: Advanced vocabulary question generation system for Japanese language education utilizing Word2Vec embeddings and Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA). Leverages distributional semantics and topic modeling for high-precision distractor generation.
features: Semantic similarity extraction using Word2Vec distributed representations
Contextual distractor generation through LDA topic modeling
Vocabulary difficulty estimation via MeCab morphological analysis
Automated quality assessment using machine learning algorithms
